version_description:
* Improved support for iPad Pro.
* Added support for the new Chromecast audio device.
* Increased font size when viewing text files.
* FLAC music files can now be streamed to Chromecast.
* Fixed remote control of video when using bluetooth hea

* Improved image metadata display.
* Improved image resolution on iPad Pro.
* Added .NRW raw photo format support.
* Added “Create PDF File” option for image files.
* The Image Viewer can now attach multiple images as email attachments.
* I

8.1
* Fixed UI issue of duplicate files when copying to a sub-folder.
* Fixed image viewer pre-caching issue.

8.0
* Improved image metadata display.
* Improved image resolution on iPad Pro.
* Added .NRW raw photo format support.
*

Improved Photo Library iCloud support.
Improved image slideshow transition.

* New integrated image and video viewer.
* New slideshow transitions for images.
* Slideshow settings are now available from the image viewer menu.
* View CBZ and CBR comic files.
* View animated GIFs in the image viewer.
* File date inform

* Added ‘Autostart Next Video’ option.
* Double-tapping a photo now zooms to where tapped.
* Added ability to switch off image transitions (for rapid slideshows).
* Added Big5 language support for FTP.
* Added Favourites folder to Photo Librar

* Automatic slideshow mode when playing videos.
* Files can now be pasted into multiple folders.
* Added Handoff support to Safari when launching WebDAV Server.
* Added Siri smart reminder support.
* Improved rendering of PDFs.
* Improved v

* Fixed variable audio playback speeds.
* Fixed viewing of Comic Book files.
* Added 0.75 and 0.9 video playback rates.
* Improved video player button responsiveness.

* Added History tab to Bookmarks popup.
* Added external keyboard shortcuts for file operations.
* Added “Allow Paste Again” option for file copies.
* Improved PDF annotation options.
* Can now pass .band projects to GarageBand
* Fixed cred

* The image viewer now supports external keyboard shortcuts.
* Links in PDF files can open other PDF files.
* Improved audio lock-screen controls.
* SRT video subtitle file support.
* Stream audio/video from Google Drive.
* Show space used/

* Fixed crash when copying from a NAS drive to another folder on a NAS drive.
* Add support for EXR image files.
* Photo Library now shows original filenames of movies & photos.

* Added new PDF viewer.
* PDF documents can now be searched.
* Fixed multiple document versions being saved via the document picker.
* Can now create folders and delete items in Network Folders in the Files app.
* 4K videos can now be exported

* Thumbnails can now be resized in the image viewer.
* Fixed folder search for filenames with accented characters.
* Fixed crash when connecting to a OneDrive account.
* Fixed positioning of PDF annotations.
* Fixed file copy issue with SFTP a

* Improved iPhone X screen layouts.
* Fixed Chromecast Video streaming issue.
* Fixed Google Drive folder listing crash.
* Fixed AirPlay display cropping some photos.

* Restored video AirPlay streaming to its former glory.
* Added support for external-device high-res Flac on iOS 11.
* Fixed document picker on iOS 9 & iOS 10.

* Added new PDF viewer.
* PDF documents can now be searched.
* Fixed multiple document versions being saved via the document picker.
* Can now create folders and delete items in Network Folders in the Files app.
* 4K videos can now be exported

* Improved UI themes, especially Dark Theme.
* Display larger landscape images in grid view.
* Fixed VoiceOver mode for folder grid view.
* Fixed crash on iOS 8.

* Password-protected PDF files can now be opened.
* Improved Files app integration.

* Quick Access Tabs can now be dragged to re-arrange them.
* PDF text search now prevents text from being hidden under the navigation bar.
* Grid mode folder view has been improved. Switch off Menu icons for an even cleaner look.
* New text files

* Improved UI themes, especially Dark Theme.
* Display larger landscape images in grid view.
* Fixed VoiceOver mode for folder grid view.

* Added automatic file & folder sync feature.
* Improved Photo Library performance.
* Can now handle a large number of files in the Files app.
* Added integration with Workflow.
* Fixed multiple accounts to a single cloud storage type.
This is just a bug fix and localized-language update. We have been working on some cool features that we will be able to share with you soon. Thank you for all your feedback.

Synchronise a local folder or a Photo Library folder to remote storage.
Set up automatic file and photo backups, as many as you like, to anywhere.
Create links to cloud storage for sharing via email.
Control who has access to shared cloud conten

Improved the performance of upload-syncing to a network folder.
Added thumbnail extraction for Fujifilm raw RAF files.
Fixed the issue with File Sync not finding the server folder.
Fixed the document picker sometimes not listing network folders.<

Improved the performance of upload-syncing from the Photo Library.
Improved options when copy/pasting multiple files.
Fixed crash when syncing from Google Drive.

Fixed sub-folder searching bug.
Improved file transfer popups.
Improved Sync Files status screen.

SMB3 Support
This allows connection to Windows 10 Encrypted Shares.

XMP Support
Great for professional photographers. Rate photos or mark for rejection by creating or updating XMP metadata files.

Sync Files
Syncing files to or from

iOS 12
Added compatibility with iOS 12 and support for new iPhones.

Siri Shortcuts
Launch FileBrowserGO using voice commands to get to your folders and files easily.

FTPS
Added support for connecting to FTPS servers.

iOS 12 Bug fixes
Fixed AirPlay of photos when using the image viewer.
Fixed Chromecast devices not being discovered on the network.

FTPS
Improved thumbnail generation speed.
Added an option to force certificate verification.

Phot

Photo Library
Fixed a problem when syncing an individual Photo Library album to a remote folder.
This update adds support for using our Edit In Place feature on documents in local Sync Files locations. Edit a document and sync it back to the server when you're next in the office.

Bookmarks & Shortcuts
Shortcut actions are now supported for local folders.
Fixed an issue preventing navigation to Bookmarks in local folders.

Drag & Drop
More file types can now be dragged from other apps, such as email.
Fixed

Photo viewing
Added support for iOS 12 folders in Photo Library albums.
Fixed a crash when viewing GIF files.
Fixed thumbnails not appearing in folder search results.

Resume Browsing
Fixed a black screen that could sometimes occur when

Photo Viewing
Photos in the iOS Photo Library that have been edited are now shown with their edits/annotations.
Improved thumbnail creation when scrolling through large folders.

Wasabi S3
Can now connect to Wasabi S3 cloud storage.
This is a bug fix release, improving general stability and fixing Sync Files when no WiFi network is available.

Introducing Gallery View
This new folder view mode allows you to preview documents and perform actions faster than ever.

Bug Fixes
If you have an Admin Password in force, some of the settings on the Admin Settings->Features page may have s

Introducing New Themes
Choose a new bold colour scheme from our selection.

Audio Player
A new option in Preferences/Audio allows you to choose to have -/+15s buttons on iOS lock screen.

Bookmarks & Shortcuts
Shortcut actions are now supported for local folders.
Fixed an issue preventing navigation to Bookmarks in local folders.

Drag & Drop
More file types can now be dragged from other apps, such as email.
Fixed

Folder Sync
Sync tasks can now be set to manual or automatic sync, giving you full control.

iCloud Documents
It is now easier to import or view documents stored in the iCloud folders of other apps.

FTPS
Fixed a problem when enabling

Bug fixes
Fixed a crash that could appear when importing Sync Files settings.

New Network Document Editing Workflow
Integrate with third-party apps to edit office documents or annotate PDFs direct from a network folder.

File Sharing
Select multiple files and share them to another app or AirDrop.
Accept multiple file

Thank you for the feedback on the new features. We're delighted that you like them.

This update is a bug fix release to fix an issue with the document picker on iOS 10, improve image resizing in iOS split-screen mode on iPad Pro, and to fix a popup

Thanks for your feedback on the new features!

Because a number of editor apps you use don't support Edit In Place correctly, we have restored the "Share File" menu item to its previous functionality, copying files to other apps. Documents in networ
This update adds support for using our Edit In Place feature on documents in local Sync Files locations. Edit a document and sync it back to the server when you're next in the office.

This update adds some major new features.

Folder Sync now supports two-way syncing. You can create, modify, rename and delete files and folders in a local Sync Files location and the changes will sync back to the server when you are next online.

This update contains fixes for the following issues.

* Files accepted by the app can't be pasted into a Sync Files folder.
* Multi-selection of photos in the Photo Library can't be shared or emailed as attachments.
* Playback of music files i

This update adds the following new features.

* Access connected USB drives on iOS13.

We have more exciting iOS13 updates in the pipeline. Stay tuned.

Thank you for using our apps and for providing us with feedback. We love to hear how

This update fixes a few issues with iOS 13.

* Fixed some Photo Library album names being prefixed with a date stamp.

* Using the iOS13 Files App to open a file in the On My iPad location now opens the document rather than cutting/pasting it.

This update is a bug-fix release.

* Fixed an issue when in split-screen mode and using drag/drop with DFS file servers.

* Fixed an occasional crash when using Shuffle mode with audio playback.

* On iOS 13 the search text was too dark

This update brings a cool new feature and some bug fixes

* Multiple Rename feature has been added. This powerful feature works with all connection types and allows you to select multiple files and/or folders and rename them all at once.

Our final update for the year contains a number of fixes and improvements

* Added support for CAF audio files and CR3 RAW image files.

* Added support for HTTPS URLs in .m3u playlist files.

* Sync Files will now continue running when

Our final update for the year contains a number of fixes and improvements

* Added support for CAF audio files and CR3 RAW image files.

* Added support for HTTPS URLs in .m3u playlist files.

Just a few fixes and features before we embark on beta-testing the next major update.

* We redesigned the Rename popup to be much wider.

* We added an automatic file-recovery feature when editing text files.

* Searching within sub-fol

Multi Tabbed Browsing with Multiple Window Support on iPadOS.
Switch between storage devices and cloud services with ease using tabs.
Use split screen and drag/drop files between locations.
View multiple documents simultaneously.
So many impro

We're always amazed by how many different ways our apps are used. This update fixes several bugs found by you. Thank you for helping to make our apps better.

Unlike other file manager apps, we never gather any of your data.

This update contains a new feature, and a few bug fixes.

* You can now multi-select photos from the Camera Roll and generate a PDF from them.

* Fixed streaming media when the language is set to Spanish.
* Fixed a hang that can occur after

This update contains a new feature, and a few bug fixes.

* Support for external mouse or trackpad on iPadOS 13.4.

* Fixed a crash on launch if iCloud Drive is in the favourites list.
* Fixed Sort Folders First view mode.

More features, and a few bug fixes.

* Folder Summary Info. Find out how much space a folder is using, on any storage.
* Add folders or files as favourites on the home screen.
* Use right-click on an external mouse to bring up the file/folder

This update fixes a few issues reported recently, and updates localised text for new features.

* Fixed not being able to open a folder from a search result.
* Fixed crash when extracting thumbnails from video files.

The Get Folder Info feature that you have been enjoying is now available from the root folder of drives. Find it in the View Options menu.

This update contains several bug fixes, and some new features.

New Features
* Use Preferences->User Interface Style to change the App Icon
* A third-party app can now be set as the default player for streaming video.

This update fixes the ability to set the Administrator password.

Thank you for helping to make our apps better.

Unlike other file manager apps, we never gather any of your data.

This update adds a few new requested features and fixes a few issues.

* Multi-USB drive support. Connect multiple drives at a time.

* pCloud sign-in now supports two-factor authentication.
